backend/main.mo: Actor defines an Inquiry type, stores inquiries in a List, and exposes submit and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a logo asset addition with related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including styles, components, hooks, and HTML entry.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH variable-driven light/dark theme definitions and global background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with favicon references and script loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing header, all site sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section with company overview and a grid of four value cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Contact section providing business info cards and a validated inquiry form submitted via a mutation hook.
Displays coverage areas, delivery info cards, and a nationwide pickup banner for the logistics site.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Renders the hero banner with headline, description, CTA buttons, stats, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Shows a grid of service cards detailing logistics and delivery offerings with icons and features.
Footer with brand details, navigation links, services list, contact info, and bottom attribution bar.
Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation buttons, and mobile sheet menu using smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, updating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a mutation that sends inquiry data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables, global styles, and layout utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact form fields for name, phone, email, and message, returning errors and validity status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing logo-related issues, required assets, and pending feature requests to restore branding and favicon functionality.
